meanings.definition: A highly explosive liquid used in the manufacture of dynamite.
meanings.sent1: The workers handled the nitroglycerin with extreme caution.
meanings.sent2: The nitroglycerin was carefully transported to the construction site.
meanings.sent3: When the nitroglycerin danced, it created a big boom!
meanings.sent4: Her temper was like nitroglycerin, ready to explode at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the nitroglycerin container warned of its danger.

meanings.definition: A medication used to treat chest pain (angina).
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed nitroglycerin to relieve his patient's chest pain.
meanings.sent2: She always carried nitroglycerin tablets in case of an angina attack.
meanings.sent3: The nitroglycerin pills were like tiny superheroes fighting chest pain villains.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like nitroglycerin, soothing her pain with each beat of his heart.
meanings.sent5: The quick action of nitroglycerin saved the day during a sudden angina episode.
